Wisdom: أَشْفَقُ النَّاسِ عَلَيْكَ أَعْوَنُهُمْ لَكَ عَلَى صَلَاحِ نَفْسِكَ وَأَنْصَحُهُمْ لَكَ فِي دِينِكَ
enWisdom: The person who is most concerned about you is the one who is most helpful to you in improving [and reforming] yourself and is most sincere in advising you with regards to your religion

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْإِخْوَانِ أَقَلُّهُمْ مُصَانَعَةً فِي النَّصِيحَةِ
enWisdom: Good brotherhood increases reward and beautifies praise
The best of brothers are the most sincere [of them] and the worst of them are the most Deceitful

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ أَحَبُّ النَّاسِ إِلَيْكَ الْمُشْفِقَ النَّاصِحَ
enWisdom: Let the most beloved person to you be the compassionate adviser

Wisdom: مَنْ صَدَّقَكَ فِي نَفْسِكَ فَقَدْ أَرْشَدَكَ
enWisdom: One who is truthful to you about yourself has indeed guided you aright
Whoever gives you sincere advice has indeed helped you

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَنْصَحْكَ فِي صَدَاقَتِهِ فَلَا تَعْذِرْهُ
enWisdom: One whose friendship does not benefit you, his enmity will harm you
No one shows compassion like the sincere friend
